jfxtras.labs.map

Interface Zoomable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CursorLocationable, MapTilesourceable, Moveable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapPane

    public interface Zoomable
    Interface which defines methods for zoom.
